name: Pizzakai
description:
You died, and have been Isekai'd into a world where you are Pizza.
You cannot doubt that this is awesome.

Pizzakai is a 2D Platformer/Metroidvania game in which you play as a deceased man by the name of Peppy who has been recently reincarnated as a freshly baked Pizza mobster. Offered a deal by a "Pizza God," Peppy must enter the crime den of the House of Unified Triple-Cheeses and engage in combat if he wants any chance of returning to his own world.

Use Various Weapons to Put Holes in Your Favorite Foods!
- Use a tommy gun to decimate all visible enemies!
- Use a shotgun to blast yourself off to out-of-reach locations!
- Use a flamethrower to burn your way through obstacles!

Explore a Large Level and Encounter Various Enemies
- An agile breadstick that breaks into two and will try to slice you up!
- A cowardly chicken wing that runs away, and throws molotovs to overcook you!
- A hefty deep dish pizza that can tank much more than your own thin crust!
